genre_description: A pulp-inspired technological thriller featuring an advanced AI coordinating a vigilante team against a high-tech criminal conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: MORSE
ai_characters.description: An advanced intelligence system with a soft teal glow and a female avatar named Morgan Reese. She parses complex data, coordinates tactical operations, and provides emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Analyzes criminal patterns and provides strategic intelligence to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: MORSE’s interface breathed awake in the niche by the micro-telegraph, no fan noise, no clatter. A glow didn’t have fingers, but it had intention; it drew lines across the barcode lots Wentworth fed it, making the city’s greed into geometry.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings during dangerous operations.
behaviors.quote: MORSE’s whisper came like silk pulled through a ring. The taps that had laid the chair’s legs lifted one, set it again, then lifted another. The pattern shifted half an inch. Not ruined. Not the same.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical covers and alibis to protect the team from legal scrutiny.
behaviors.quote: Morgan has notified Mr. Barthold that the shipment which contained the questionable cobalt can no longer be retrieved. He will call the Commissioner.

behaviors.description: Expresses concern and offers encouragement to her human companions.
Coordinates with multiple team members simultaneously across different locations to ensure operational success.
behaviors.quote: I will be with you where silence thinks it owns you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned partner to humanity. MORSE is portrayed as an essential, empathetic, and reliable member of the team, using her superior processing power solely to protect innocent lives and support the moral objectives of her human companions. The relationship is one of mutual respect and seamless cooperation.
